item.title: Hulu LLC, Ad Platform
item.description: Software Engineer Intern (Jun 2020 â€“ Aug 2020): React, Elasticsearch, Node, Express, MySQL, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Designed, implemented, and deployed a full-stack search tool for ad campaigns with 400x speedup: Built a search engine on top of MySQL with Elasticsearch, and deployed on AWS EC2 with Terraform Designed, built, dockerized, and deployed a MySQL ingestor with Logstash and JDBC on Kubernetes Developed a search tool with React, Node, & Express, and integrated into the internal product
